C2 Someone who is accountable is completely responsible for what they do and must be able to give a satisfactory reason for it: accountable to She is accountable only to the managing director. Politicians should be accountable to the public who elected them.accountable for The recent tax reforms have made government more accountable for its spending.hold someone accountable for something You have to hold your employees accountable for their actions, or else they will just do whatever they please.
